channel.title: Professional Services on Cucumber Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Professional Services on Cucumber Documentation

item.title: Classroom training
item.description: Cucumber Ltd run private and public Behaviour-Driven Development training and coaching services around the world. To make an on-site enquiry or to see a list of upcoming public course dates, head to our training page.

item.title: Books
item.description: We like these Books Discovery This practical guide by Gáspár Nagy and Seb Rose explains good collaboration techniques, illustrated by concrete examples. The Cucumber Book Matt Wynne and Aslak Hellesøy show you how to express your customers’ wild ideas as a set of clear, executable specifications that everyone on the team can read. BDD in Action
